text: The mixed doubles tennis event at the 2015 Summer Universiade was held from July 7 to 12 at the Jawol International Tennis Court in Gwangju, South Korea. Lidziya Marozava and Andrei Vasilevski of Belarus won the gold medal, defeating Alexandra Walker and Darren Walsh of Great Britain in the final, 6–2, 6–3. Chang Kai-chen and Peng Hsien-yin of Chinese Taipei and Veronika Kudermetova and Aslan Karatsev of Russia won the bronze medals. ==Seeds== The top five seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== *Main Draw Category:Tennis at the 2015 Summer Universiade
title: Tennis at the 2015 Summer Universiade – Mixed Doubles
